query.statement:
INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZPST11071DB ( MANDT, PJT, HNO, SEQNO, A_1_1, A_1_2, A_1_3, A_1_4, A_5_1, A_5_2, A_5_3, A_5_4, A_6_1, A_6_2, A_6_3, A_6_4, A_2_1, A_2_2, A_2_3, A_2_4, A_3_1, A_3_2, A_3_3, A_3_4, A_4_1, A_4_2, A_4_3, A_4_4, B_1_1, B_1_2, B_1_3, B_1_4, B_2_1, B_2_2, B_2_3, B_2_4, B_3, A1, A2, A3, A4, A5, A6, B_4 , MOBILE , VALUE )
SELECT A.MANDT, A.PJT, A.HNO, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11071DB X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PJT = A.PJT AND X.HNO = A.HNO) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE (SELECT MAX(X.SEQNO) + 1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11071DB X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.PJT = A.PJT AND X.HNO = A.HNO)
END ) AS SEQNO, A.A_1_1, A.A_1_2, A.A_1_3, A.A_1_4, A.A_5_1, A.A_5_2, A.A_5_3, A.A_5_4, A.A_6_1, A.A_6_2, A.A_6_3, A.A_6_4, A.A_2_1, A.A_2_2, A.A_2_3, A.A_2_4, A.A_3_1, A.A_3_2, A.A_3_3, A.A_3_4, A.A_4_1, A.A_4_2, A.A_4_3, A.A_4_4, A.B_1_1, A.B_1_2, A.B_1_3, A.B_1_4, A.B_2_1, A.B_2_2, A.B_2_3, A.B_2_4, A.B_3, A.A1, A.A2, A.A3, A.A4, A.A5, A.A6, A.B_4, '' AS MOBILE , VALUE((SELECT VALUE(X.VALUE, '') FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.HOGI = A.PJT||A.HNO AND X.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_EHM' ORDER BY X.SEQ DESC fetch first 1 rows only ), '') AS VALUE -- ÀçÁú
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11071D AS A WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = #PJT# AND A.HNO = #HNO#
